Text:
Eternal Flame (Deu)
Genre(s)
Heavy Metal
Origin	Formed in	Last label 	Status
Germany (Munich, Bavaria) 	1993	MTM Music	Split-up
Last known line-up
Michael Schinkel - Lead Vocals, Guitar (Stormhammer)
Christian Brezendorfer - Guitar
Tom Keller - Bass, Backing Vocals
Thomas Streck - Keyboards (Serum)
Robert Breit - Drums
Former/past member(s)
Ferdinand Jamitzky - Keyboards, Backing Vocals

Discography


Desire	Full-length, 1999	
King Of The King	Full-length, 2002
